column4: this isn't strictly ubuntu, but can anyone tell me what the ip addresses of opendns' dns servers are? I think my ISP's servers are down
Though I'd recommend Verizon DNS instead - 4.2.2.1-5
hmm. that didnt seem to work. any idea why i'd be able to communicate with irc and google but not anything by name (eg. slashdot.org)? this is the case for all computers connected to my router
